title: Our LAST 1 Bedroom coming in September!
posting_body: **available to view and move in on September 7th**
This first floor suite is truly a one of a kind!
It offers a spacious kitchen, garbage disposal, exhaust fan in the bathroom, central air, and HUGE closets; which does not even include the extra storage unit you get with this apartment!
In addition, this suite comes with wall to wall carpet, accent walls, plentiful electrical outlets, central heating and air, and is conveniently located in the heart of Parma!

We also include free parking, multiple entrances/exits, 2 elevators, free sewage, capped gas and water, an indoor heated pool, 24 hour fitness center, picnic area with grills, sun deck, 24 hour laundry facility, and a remodeled party room!
And if that is not enough….We also offer intercom access, camera footage inside and out, 24 hour emergency maintenance, a community garden, a dog walking area, and free events throughout the year!
• Water $25.00 for the first person $5.00 each additional occupant
Our suites go fast, please reach out today!!
We follow the City of Parma Breed Restrictions
All dogs must be under 35 lbs at full grown
Up to date on all shots
